context_evidences: - The mRNA vaccines developed by Pfizer-BioNTech and Moderna, however, do not use nanorobotic technology. Reuters Fact Check previously debunked claims that the presence of lipid nanoparticles in a COVID-19 vaccine means it could contain small robots or computers, here . Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-mrna-megamix/fact-check-mrna-vaccines-do-not-turn-humans-into-hybrids-or-alter-recipients-dna-idUSL1N2M61HW published on 2021-04-13 14:59:57

- The social media posts claim that the “RNA vaccine contains nano technology.” As explained here by Reuters in a previous fact-check article, the term “nano,” is simply a unit of size: the general definition of “nanoparticle” is a small particle that is between 1 and 100 nanometers in size ( here ). The lipid nanoparticles in the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine protect and transport the vaccine component to the right place in cells ( here ). Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-covid-vaccine-ingredients/fact-check-covid-19-vaccines-do-not-alter-a-recipients-dna-and-u-s-fda-does-not-list-death-as-a-side-effect-idUSL1N2LK1KK published on 2021-03-22 15:35:22

- The language in the patent's abstract (also seen on page one here ) describes a contact tracing process that uses "electronic devices." These would generate an ID number, and when in the proximity of another device, one or both electronic devices could transmit/receive information to/from the other electronic device. A score is then generated based on a plurality of such received IDs. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-patent-contact-tracing/fact-check-pictured-patent-is-for-contact-tracing-not-implantable-5g-tracking-idUSL1N2RI25R published on 2021-10-22 18:40:38

- The posts’ claim that the vaccine’s mRNA remains in the body “forever” is false. According to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), “Once the instructions (mRNA) are inside the immune cells, the cells use them to make the protein piece. After the protein piece is made, the cell breaks down the instructions and gets rid of them” ( here ). Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-mrna-megamix/fact-check-mrna-vaccines-do-not-turn-humans-into-hybrids-or-alter-recipients-dna-idUSL1N2M61HW published on 2021-04-13 14:59:57

- The Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine ingredients are listed in a fact sheet on the FDA’s website here . The ingredients are mRNA (messenger RNA), lipids, potassium chloride, monobasic potassium phosphate, sodium chloride, dibasic sodium phosphate dihydrate and sucrose. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-covid-vaccine-ingredients/fact-check-covid-19-vaccines-do-not-alter-a-recipients-dna-and-u-s-fda-does-not-list-death-as-a-side-effect-idUSL1N2LK1KK published on 2021-03-22 15:35:22

- By reading the patent, it is clear the electronic devices are thought out as external appliances a person could carry, like a cellphone or pager (i.e. they say, “electronic devices configured to be carried around by said subjects,” under example 19 in the “Summary of Invention”). Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-patent-contact-tracing/fact-check-pictured-patent-is-for-contact-tracing-not-implantable-5g-tracking-idUSL1N2RI25R published on 2021-10-22 18:40:38
correction_response:
This tweet is misinformed. The mRNA vaccines do not alter the recipient's DNA, nor do they connect individuals to 5G or track people with implanted graphene oxide or microchips. The nanotechnology in mRNA vaccines is not harmful and does not transform recipients into "hybrids". The patent mentioned is for contact tracing, not implantable 5G tracking, and is registered to inventors in Israel, not Pfizer. The claims about CERN and the "Super Computer" called "The Beast" are not supported by any credible sources. 
References: 
https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-patent-contact-tracing/fact-check-pictured-patent-is-for-contact-tracing-not-implantable-5g-tracking-idUSL1N2RI25R
https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-mrna-megamix/fact-check-mrna-vaccines-do-not-turn-humans-into-hybrids-or-alter-recipients-dna-idUSL1N2M61HW
https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-covid-vaccine-ingredients/fact-check-covid-19-vaccines-do-not-alter-a-recipients-dna-and-u-s-fda-does-not-list-death-as-a-side-effect-idUSL1N2LK1KK
note_1_text: Covid vaccines being linked to 5G is an error of spatial analysis:    https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8576388/    Also, 5G microchips cannot fit through a 22-25 gauge needle, and require a power source:    https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/admin/downloads/vaccine-administration-needle-length.pdf    The smallest RFID chip could fit, but with the required coil would be 13 times larger than the 25 gauge needle:    https://wraltechwire.com/2021/05/13/ncsu-team-builds-smallest-rfid-chip-could-mean-better-security/
note_2_text: This Tweet is so beyond plausible that it’s difficult to know where to start. That said, geography is easy. CERN is nowhere near the Temple of Apollo.   https://home.cern/directions  https://www.corinth-museum.gr/en/archaeological-site/temple-of-apollo/
queries:
1. Does the COVID-19 vaccine contain RNA modifying nanotechnology?
2. Is CERN located on the former Temple of Apollo?
3. Does 5G technology connect with the human body through vaccines?
refute_evidences: - The patent text makes no mention of connecting individuals to 5G or tracking people with implanted graphene oxide or microchips via vaccines as claimed in the posts on social media. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-patent-contact-tracing/fact-check-pictured-patent-is-for-contact-tracing-not-implantable-5g-tracking-idUSL1N2RI25R published on 2021-10-22 18:40:38

- The posts falsely claim that those vaccinated with mRNA vaccines are “no longer human” but rather “hybrids” because the vaccines’ “nanotechnology… spreads itself throughout the body altering the dna & reeking [sic] havoc on the entire system.” As explained here in a previous Reuters fact check, mRNA vaccines do not alter the recipient’s DNA. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-mrna-megamix/fact-check-mrna-vaccines-do-not-turn-humans-into-hybrids-or-alter-recipients-dna-idUSL1N2M61HW published on 2021-04-13 14:59:57

- Contrary to claims on social media, COVID-19 vaccines using messenger RNA (mRNA) technology do not transform recipients from humans into “hybrids,” nor do they alter human DNA through nanotechnology. The Pfizer-BioNTech and Moderna vaccines use a new mRNA technology involving the injection of a small part of the virus’s genetic code (RNA) to stimulate the recipient’s immune response. The mRNA does not alter the recipient’s DNA; it is broken down shortly after vaccination, and does not stay in the body. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-mrna-megamix/fact-check-mrna-vaccines-do-not-turn-humans-into-hybrids-or-alter-recipients-dna-idUSL1N2M61HW published on 2021-04-13 14:59:57

- The CDC says that a COVID-19 vaccine will not alter the recipient’s DNA, explaining that “the mRNA from a COVID-19 vaccine never enters the nucleus of the cell, which is where our DNA is kept. This means the mRNA cannot affect or interact with our DNA in any way” ( here ). Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-covid-vaccine-ingredients/fact-check-covid-19-vaccines-do-not-alter-a-recipients-dna-and-u-s-fda-does-not-list-death-as-a-side-effect-idUSL1N2LK1KK published on 2021-03-22 15:35:22

- These COVID-19 vaccines do not modify DNA, the FDA does not list death as a side effect for them and the vaccines contain only one of the ingredients listed. Along with the nanotechnology in mRNA vaccines, it is not harmful. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-covid-vaccine-ingredients/fact-check-covid-19-vaccines-do-not-alter-a-recipients-dna-and-u-s-fda-does-not-list-death-as-a-side-effect-idUSL1N2LK1KK published on 2021-03-22 15:35:22

- The patent, however, is listed as registered to inventors Gal Ehrlich and Maier Fenster, patent attorneys at Ehrlich and Fenster in Israel ( here ), not Pfizer. Gal Ehrlich confirmed to Reuters via phone call that the patent had nothing to do with the vaccines themselves, calling the social media claims false. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/article/factcheck-patent-contact-tracing/fact-check-pictured-patent-is-for-contact-tracing-not-implantable-5g-tracking-idUSL1N2RI25R published on 2021-10-22 18:40:38
tweet_category: Human Rights, Social Issues, and Activism
tweet_text: You can’t make this up…inside these ‘vaccines’ are RNA modifying nanotechnology…that connects YOUR BODY to 5G (Pentagram)…which receives signals from CERN 666…and said ‘Super Computer’ that powers CERN is called ‘The Beast’…CERN is located on the former Temple of Apollo.
user_description: Unofficial Queen of the World Economic Forum. Conspiracy Theorist. Bill Gates’ Best Friend. Communism Ruins Everything ™
